metadata.Title: CVE-2020-21674 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Heap-based buffer overflow in archive_string_append_from_wcs()(archive_string.c) in libarchive-3.4.1dev allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (out-of-bounds write in heap memory resulting into acrash) via a crafted archive file. NOTE: this only affects users whodownloaded the development code from GitHub. Users of the product'sofficial releases are unaffected.

criterions.comment: libarchive: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
